mapper.select: select * from (select /*+ INDEX_DESC (tbl_question pk_question) */ ROWNUM rn, qno, question, regdate, (regdate + ( 1/ (24 * 60) * limittime))-sysdate time from TBL_question where qno > 0 and ROWNUM <= (#{page} * #{size})) where rn > (#{page}-1) * #{size}

select question, mno, qno, reply, name, percent from (select question, mno, q.qno, reply, name, (sum(reply) over())/(count(*) over()) * 100 percent from (select qno,r.mno,reply,cmt,name from tbl_response r, tbl_qmember m where r.mno = m.mno)rm, tbl_question q where rm.qno = q.qno and q.qno = #{qno}) where mno= #{mno}
select qno, question from tbl_question where qno = #{qno}
